title: Add control ideas research document for community toolkit expansion
body:
Research document proposing new SkiaSharp-based controls for the community toolkit, based on analysis of existing features, GitHub issues, and industry trends.

## Proposed Controls

Prioritized by impact and implementation complexity:

- **SKShimmerView** — Skeleton loading animation with animated gradients
- **SKRippleView** — Material Design touch feedback
- **SKGaugeView** — Radial/linear gauges for dashboards
- **SKParticleView** — General particle system (snow, rain, fire, sparkles)
- **SKSparklineView** — Inline trend charts
- **SKProgressRing** — Circular progress with customizable styles
- **SKGradientView** — Animated mesh/conic gradients
- **SKMorphView** — Path-to-path morphing animations
- **SKDonutChart** — Pie/donut data visualization
- **SKBlurView** — Real-time glassmorphism effects

## Document Contents

- Example XAML APIs for each control
- Use cases and implementation complexity
- Priority matrix based on community demand
- Utility feature suggestions (gradient builders, shadow helpers, animation utilities)
- Summary of community-requested Lottie improvements from open issues

Located at `docs/CONTROL_IDEAS.md`.
